text: Youngstown is an unincorporated community in Adair County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== A post office called Youngstown was established in 1903, and remained in operation until 1942. The community derives its name from George Young, the original owner of the town site. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Adair County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Youngstown, Missouri
